SEARCH
Package org.uma.evolver.parameter.catalogue.selectionparameter

Class DoubleSelectionParameter

java.lang.Object
org.uma.evolver.parameter.Parameter<String>
org.uma.evolver.parameter.type.CategoricalParameter
org.uma.evolver.parameter.catalogue.selectionparameter.DoubleSelectionParameter
public class DoubleSelectionParameter extends CategoricalParameter
Specialized selection parameter for double solutions that extends the base CategoricalParameter. This parameter manages selection strategies specifically designed for double solutions in evolutionary algorithms.

The class supports differential evolution selection as a selection strategy and allows configuration of specific parameters required for this selection method.

Required specific subparameters:

  • sequenceGenerator: A SequenceGeneratorParameter that provides the sequence generator for differential evolution
  • takeCurrentSolutionAsParent: A BooleanParameter that controls whether the current solution should be used as a parent in differential evolution

Author:
Antonio J. Nebro

  • Constructor Details

    • DoubleSelectionParameter

      public DoubleSelectionParameter(List<String> selectionStrategies)
      Creates a new DoubleSelectionParameter with the specified selection strategies.
      Parameters:
      selectionStrategies - List of available selection strategy names
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if selectionStrategies is null or empty

    • DoubleSelectionParameter

      public DoubleSelectionParameter(String name, List<String> selectionStrategies)
      Creates a new DoubleSelectionParameter with the specified name and selection strategies.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the parameter
      selectionStrategies - A list of valid selection strategy names. Supported values: - "differentialEvolutionSelection"
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if selectionStrategies is null or empty

    • DoubleSelectionParameter

      public DoubleSelectionParameter()
      Creates a new DoubleSelectionParameter with the default selection strategy.

      This constructor initializes the parameter with differential evolution selection as the only available strategy, which is suitable for most use cases involving double solutions in differential evolution algorithms.

      See Also:
      • for creating a parameter with custom selection strategies

  • Method Details

    • getSelection

      public org.uma.jmetal.component.catalogue.ea.selection.Selection<org.uma.jmetal.solution.doublesolution.DoubleSolution> getSelection(int matingPoolSize)
      Creates and returns a Selection component for double solutions based on the configured selection strategy.
      Parameters:
      matingPoolSize - The size of the mating pool for selection
      Returns:
      A Selection component configured with the appropriate selection strategy
      Throws:
      org.uma.jmetal.util.errorchecking.JMetalException - if an unknown selection strategy is configured
